Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Theorist \The"o*rist\, n. [Cf. F. th['e]oriste.] One who forms theories; one given to theory and speculation; a speculatist. --Cowper. [1913 Webster]
The greatest theoretists have given the preference to such a government as that which obtains in this kingdom. --Addison. [1913 Webster] [1913 Webster]
theorist n : someone who theorizes (especially in science or art) [syn: {theoretician}, {theorizer}, {theoriser}]
